Html:
Really struggling with this...
I have hundreds of low power radio transmitters giving me a USB/serial data feed every 2.8 seconds. I want to be able to show their status with different coloured custom icons, but I just can't seem to crack this one.
I'm using VB2010 and have everything else working, but can't work this one out.
Can anyone help me ?

Ta!
i see no problems use custom markers

Hi Radioman,

That's where the problem lies 'custom markers' !

I've been trying to implement some code to call and use them for over a week now, and I just can't crack it.
I have all my required icons added into my.resources, but just can't bring them in to play because I can't find any example code
Is there a sample code you could give me as a pointer.

Ta!
open the eyes and look here: https://greatmaps.codeplex.com/SourceControl/latest
